title: [net] Simplify waker functionality
body: These changes make it easier to mock the handle and simplify waker usage.

title: Make networking generic
body:
This will allow greater re-use of the reactor for other p2p
applications, as well as create a clearer separation between
protocol and i/o.

title: Add signet network
body: Also add a From implementation between nakamoto::Network and bitcoin::Network

title: Upgrade rust-bitcoin to v0.28.0
body: Upgrading `rust-bitcoin` to `0.28.0`. There are a few breaking changes in terms of the API but nothing significant.

title: Refactor time/clock usage
body:
We provide a shared clock object that is passed to sub-protocols
instead of passing the time into every function that needs it.

title: Fix filter rollback behavior
body:
Instead of reverting a number of headers, we rollback to a specific
height. The issue we fix is that in cases where the filter header chain
is not caught up with the block header chain, this would cause a
re-download of perfectly valid filters.

title: Refactor protocol type
body:
The 'Input' type is now only used in tests. General cleanup
of unused functionality.

title: [p2p] Header sync improvements
body:
* Make sure that `inv` messages don't interfere with header sync
* Make sure we don't have more than one inflight message per peer
* Retry requests resulting from `inv` announcements correctly

title: Re-introduce a `Protocol` trait
body:
This allows the protocol implementation to for example be behind a
channel, or for inputs to be processed in some way before they are
given to the protocol.

title: Make dyn error types Send + Sync + 'static
body:
In order for errors to be used downstream it helps if they can be sent
between threads i.e., `Send + Sync + 'static`.

Add type constraints to the two error variants that use `dyn Error`.

P.S loving this library, thanks for your work!

title: [P2P] Add `on_getdata` hook
body: Add `getdata` hook so that wallet users can respond to `inv` messages.

title: Add CI
body: Add CI to test across window, linux and macos

title: wait_for_peers fix
body: Fix issue with wait closure re-declaring number of peer negotiated

title: Typo & Licens bump
body:
Trivial

This is a very exciting project - thanks for the work thus far!
